project.name: Gamerlay
project.author: Tomáš Chvátal
project.description: The Gamerlay subproject manages various games not accepted by portage games team in specifed overlay.

body.p: If you want to get involved with improving Gentoo's gamers experience, we'd like to hear from you! The main thing you'll want to do is be active on Gentoo's Bugzilla. Also please join desktop project members in #gentoo-gamerlay on irc.freenode.net.
